data.title: Annelise Hesme Movies and Shows
data.meta_description: Learn about Annelise Hesme on Apple TV. Browse shows and movies that feature Annelise Hesme including Alexander, Priceless, and more.
data.text: Annelise Hesme is a French actress. Her older sister Ãlodie Hesme and younger sister Clotilde Hesme are also actresses. Born in Beaumont, Puy-de-DÃ´me, Auvergne, France. Hesme has appeared in many films such as Tanguy (2001), Avenue Montaigne (2006) and also Alexander (2004) as Stateira. She also appeared in the French film Priceless with fellow actress and townswoman Audrey Tautou in 2006. As well as this, she has become particularly well known and popular in the United Kingdom and Ireland following the 2005 Renault Clio advert "France vs. Britain" directed by Jordan Scott who also directed the 2007 follow up spot "More Va Va Voom" again starring Hesme as Sophie and British actor Jeremy Sheffield as Ben. 2007, She can also be seen in the MoliÃ¨re playing the rÃ´le of an actress in his troupe, and Our Earthmen Friends by Bernard Werber. Also in Paris by CÃ©dric Klapisch, Not My Type by Lucas Belvaux, Le PÃ¨re NoÃ«l starring Tahar Rahim, One Wild Moment by Jean-FranÃ§ois Richet, and as ÃloÃ¯se Martin alongside Kris Marshall in the 2015 independent British film Sparks & Embers. Television appearances are L'Ãtat de Grace (2006), Chateaubriand (2010) as Juliette RÃ©camier, Inquisitio (2012), R.I.S, police scientifique (2014), and Title role for Nina since 2015. Hesme plays both the cello and the piano. She is fluent in English and French.
